thread.title: SEP Software Corp. Announces Sponsorship of EDUCAUSE 2015
thread.title_full: SEP Software Corp. Announces Sponsorship of EDUCAUSE 2015

author: admin
title: SEP Software Corp. Announces Sponsorship of EDUCAUSE 2015
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: SEP Software Corp. 
BOULDER, Colo., Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- SEP Software Corp. will be showcasing its enterprise-wide backup and disaster recovery solution, SEP sesam, at EDUCAUSE 2015 . The conference will be held October 27-30, 2015 at the Indiana Convention Center in Indianapolis, IN. SEP will be in booth #1950 and will be conducting product demos throughout the week. SEP offers a single console to manage backup and disaster recovery for entire enterprises and is scalable from small businesses to global 100 companies. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150928/271270 
"EDUCAUSE is a great show for us because we work with a lot of Universities and have a very strong presence in the EDU space. A lot of the people we've met at EDUCAUSE have already switched to SEP and we look forward to being able to help more Universities and Colleges this year," said Lanai Bayne, VP of Business Development for SEP Software Corp. 
EDUCAUSE's annual conference prides itself in being the premier higher education IT event of the year. Individuals from various niches of the higher education community come together to network and discuss burgeoning technologies and opportunities to improve infrastructure within their institutions. EDUCAUSE hosts the newest technology innovations in the exhibit hall from more than 220 companies showcasing their products and services. SEP is ready to showcase some exciting new developments in their software that have been implemented over the past year. 
About SEP Software Corp. 
SEP Software offers a single backup and disaster recovery solution for heterogeneous environments of any size. SEP's flagship solution, SEP sesam , uses its multi-streaming technology to facilitate unlimited simultaneous data streams to provide some of the highest performance in the backup market. SEP is cross-platform, multi-OS, and supports every popular database and Groupware solution available. Exceptional remote management capabilities allow users to easily and efficiently manage thousands of locations around the globe from one central location. SEP specializes in replacing multiple backup software products with one standardized solution for every environment.
